DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Telephone counsel treatment may reduce stress improve well-being quality life patient cervical cancer . Changes quality life may relate change immune function neuroendocrine function . PURPOSE : This randomized phase I trial study well telephone counsel work compare standard care reduce stress patient complete treatment stage I , stage II , stage III cervical cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Telephone Counseling Standard Care Patients Who Have Completed Treatment Stage I , Stage II , Stage III Cervical Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare quality life ( QOL ) baseline change QOL , immune response , neuroendocrine parameter time patient complete treatment stage I-III cervical cancer receive psychosocial telephone counsel v usual care . - Correlate psychosocial measure immunologic stance . OUTLINE : This randomize , control , parallel-group study . Patients randomize 1 2 intervention arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo psychosocial telephone counsel comprise 5 weekly session 1-month follow-up session learn strategy reduce stress . - Arm II : Patients undergo usual care approximately 4 month . All patient complete questionnaire Quality life assessment baseline 4 month . They also undergo saliva blood sample collection baseline 4 month neuroimmune study . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 50 patient accrue study .
